full_summary:
***
# Windshield R/H Tender Notice (W8485-237543/C)
## Procurement Overview

The Department of National Defence is seeking quotations for a tender opportunity, as detailed below.

### Item 1: Windshield R/H
*   Item Description: Right-hand windshield (GSIN: 1560, NSN: 1560-14-470-3568)
*   Quantity: 10 units
*   Unit of Issue: Each
*   Delivery Location: 25 CFSD Montreal (Free Carrier)

### Tender Requirements
*   This tender opportunity is conducted through a competitive bidding process.
*   Bidders must submit their quotation in either English or French, in accordance with the [Supply Arrangements](#supply-arrangements).
*   The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Supporting Documents
*   RFP (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4907/w8485-237543-c-rfp-eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4907/w8485-237543-c-rfp-eng.pdf)
*   RFP (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4907/w8485-237543-c-rfp-fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4907/w8485-237543-c-rfp-fr.pdf)

### Contact Information
*   Ryan Duncan
*   Procurement Officer
*   Department of National Defence
*   Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca
*   (613) 292-9650

***

Used Steps:
To rewrite the text in a more professional manner, the following rephrasing steps were taken:

*   **Tender Title**: Instead of using the exact title provided, a more descriptive title (“Windshield R/H Tender Notice”) was created to summarize the request.
*   **Item Description**: Rephrased the item description to an industry-standard format (GSIN: NSN: Item Description), allowing for efficient data comparison.
*   **Specifications**: Please omit unnecessary information like contractors' contact information and include only relevant data. 
*   **procurementProcess***Although the contractor listed the tender requirements broadly, the rephrased document names specific regulations and processes in place (competitive bidding, English
